name: Wood Block Master - Brain Game
description:
How to Play Wood Block Master?
- Drag and drop wood blocks to fill in a vertical or horizontal line. If it fits, initial blocks on the same vertical or horizontal line will disappear, and freeing up spaces for new blocks.
- The game will be over if there is no space for given wood blocks
- Wooden blocks of different shapes

Features:
- Classic wood block puzzle with fun features
- No time limit
- Hours of fun
- Contain helpful tools to get high scores
- Free and easy to play
- Relax gaming pace

Let's download this fun and addictive puzzle game now!
